abstract: Dale Lewis prepares for his final season as director of summer day camp Usdan Center for the Creative and Performing Arts, which occupies wooded area in Huntington; recalls growth of program over 32 years and nurturing of many young artists, some of whom went on to have successful careers as performers (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: After more than 30 years, Dale Lewis is saying goodbye to Usdan, in Huntington, which has alumni like Natalie Portman, Mariah Carey and Jane Monheit.

headline.main: Director Reflects on His Tenure at Long Island Arts Camp
headline.print_headline: Three Decades of Nurturing Young Artists

snippet: After more than 30 years, Dale Lewis is saying goodbye to Usdan, in Huntington, which has alumni like Natalie Portman, Mariah Carey and Jane Monheit.

keywords.value: Usdan Center for the Creative and Performing Arts
